thread.title: Huntington Library and UC Riverside teaming up to hire humanities professors
thread.title_full: Huntington Library and UC Riverside teaming up to hire humanities professors - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Huntington Library and UC Riverside teaming up to hire humanities professors
text: Larry GordonContact Reporter In an effort to promote scholarship in the humanities, the Huntington Library will subsidize the hiring of two professors at UC Riverside and host them as researchers for two years. Plans being announced
